name: Run For Your Life! (DylanCreatesGames)
description:
A gameboy game you can actually play on real hardware!

made for the barckeys game jam 2021.1

I was going to make a game which fit the theme (stronger together) more (I was thinking a time based co-op puzzle game) but ended up just making an endless runner.

The story goes that you are a ghost and you have to try and get to your body, the closer you get to your body the faster (stronger) you go.

does this work with the theme? I guess.

Is it polished and have no bugs? Definitely not, when your going really fast you can clip through enemies and sometimes you go through the ground when starting the game.

You can download the game to hear some of the sound effects.

You will have to download an emulator to play it unless you have a gameboy with a flash cart.

Controls:

on the menu screen and game over screen press start.

Have fun!
